text: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِىٓ أَعْنَـٰقِهِمْ أَغْلَـٰلًا فَهِىَ إِلَى ٱلْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Kami telah memasang belenggu dileher mereka, lalu tangan mereka (diangkat) ke dagu, maka karena itu mereka tertengadah.
